page.title: 17VILLAGE EVENTS
page.content: There are many annual and traditional events which combine{entertainment } with{fundraising.}1)Adults & childre- ns Xmas parties.2)pancake races up the main village street in February.3)A 50/50 auction in the hall who take half of the proceeds-half to the seller.4)A spring jumble sale.5)A summer fete-proceeds shared between the church & chapel.6)A summer tennis tournament.7)A{Sports}Day for adults & children with sprints 3-legged races, egg & spoon,sack races.8)A square dance in September.9)The{Drawing Match probably the oldest of Denton's events -name deriving from"drawing a straight furrow" & is a test of all farming skills.10)An annual show by Denton Variety Club.11)The Harvest Supper-a sit-down meal for 90 cooked by ladies of the village.
